newsitem.title: FRANCE: PRESS DIGEST - France - Le Monde Nov 18.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - France - Le Monde Nov 18.

text.p: These are leading stories in afternoon daily Le Monde.
-- 52 percent of the French satisfied with the national education system, survey shows.

-- Experts are divided over whether the future European currency should be in a strong or a weak position against the dollar. The future European Central Bank is expected to wield enough power to offset pressures for competitive devaluations.
-- Pechiney to pull out of food can production, beverage cans excepted, to concentrate on core activity.
-- Compagnie de Suez to sell four billion francs of real-estate assets to U.S. investment fund Whitehall through investment bank Goldman Sachs.
